Hm, to be honest, I'd prefer to fix this issue by just replacing the current approach with an adapted version of [this one](https://github.com/simonwhitaker/github-fork-ribbon-css) - it's simply the best 💚 
The one we currently have uses an approach [like this](https://codepen.io/hmps/pen/kiFum), which results in overflowing edges and is way harder to fix than just using a single `a` tag.
